column4: hey I have ndiswrapper installed and my wireless is not working still
you are aware that you need to setup your wifi's window driver in ndiswrapper right ?
check in the forum and on this link,  see if they have any specifics about your card ,  https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HardwareSupport
I'm no good with wifi , but it might just be a change in the app , if you just upgraded
